author: mtosi
body:
as discussed in PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/18252
this PR is meant to fix the master 
- DQM/Integration/python/clients/hlt_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py
- DQM/Integration/python/config/inputsource_cfi.py
- DQM/SiPixelPhase1Summary/src/SiPixelPhase1Summary.cc
and align some code which will enter in 90x while they were missing in the master
- RecoTracker/MeasurementDet/plugins/MeasurementTrackerEventProducer.cc
title: fix DQM core config and SiPixelPhase1Summary + align master to 90x updates (MeasurementTrackerEventProducer)
